page.title: 08PINGLE PARTY.
page.content: Every June we have a{Pingle Party. There are many activities that you can take part in, for example darts,treasure hunt and hit the mouse. Every year there are demonstrations for the older ones,{BMX}etc.For the younger ones there is a{bouncy castle, {swings and Punch and Judy.}There are cakes and drinks for{refreshments. Every body enjoys themselves. This year there was a BMX demonstration. The bouncy castle and the swing boats were supposed to come but they didn't.The refreshments were in the hall and a{jazz band}came.The band were from Calverton and they played many tunes. One game was to guess the weight of the pig. The pig was small but it was very heavy . This was 10p a go. The person who guessed the correct weight won.It was great fun.
